value.0:
This weathered yet well cared for book is filled with small notes and remarks recorded by Blackcoats operating in the south.

Some of the various notes pertain to established methods of battlefield apothecary, and Blackcoats are said to have advanced abilities to improvise materials and render aid to those who need it.

All Blackcoat recipes actually begin with using a holy water flask to start. By combining this with other seemingly mundane materials, and spending an amount of gold as necessary, the Blackcoat knows what incantations will produce the following:

-Hands of Garlic and Holy Water, for Healing Draughts.

-Multicolored Sand and Holy Water, for an Antidote.

-Diamond Dust and Holy Water, for a Restorative.

-Powdered Silver and Holy Water, to create Wolvesbane.

-A masterwork bolt and a bit of holy parchment, properly combined, will render a Holy Bolt to strike down any foe.
